subject: Economy
topic: Rajasthan ki Pramukh Kalyankari Yojnayein aur Flagship Programs
question_en: Which flagship program of Rajasthan's economy focuses on promoting agro-based industries?
question_hi: राजस्थान के आरूढ़ का प्रमुख काम अंतर्जनक आंसुओं का प्रमुख प्रणाम करता है?
explanation_en: Rajasthan State Rural Livelihood Mission focuses on promoting livelihood opportunities and overall development in rural areas of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान राजमेंग तमान मुख्य संगठन (RSLM) focuses on promoting livelihood opportunities and overall development in rural areas of Rajasthan.
explanation: Rajasthan Rural Livelihood Mission (RSLM) focuses on promoting livelihood opportunities and overall development in rural areas of Rajasthan.
